msg: Transferred from the Adobe Open Source Subversion Repository
In frameworks, remove Adobe headers from all files except xml/mxml file types.  There are also a few .txt files that are license files that I didn't touch yet.
Transferred from the Adobe Open Source Subversion Repository
TextArea scrolling sync and SoftKeyboard iOS bug fixes
SDK-30476 - Going home after opening the soft keyboard doesn't restore the application to full size
Listen for the application DEACTIVATE event and close the softKeyboard if it is open
SDK-30468 - Text scrolls upwards when entering edit mode in a TextArea
With the runtime fix, I need to convert from 0-based to 1-based index for scrollV
SDK-30197 - scroll position incorrect when leaving edit mode
Resize the TextArea before cleaning up the scroll positions
Transferred from the Adobe Open Source Subversion Repository
SDK-30404 - Second press in TextArea with long text shows text outside of TextArea

Added null check for oldCaretBounds. It is getting set to null because we shrink the TextField and the caret position is outside the bounds of the new TextField size. This particular issue will get resolved in a later fix.
Transferred from the Adobe Open Source Subversion Repository
New rightMargin value for iPod 3 and iPad (160 DPI, no scaling) for SDK-29959. New values should minimize reflow.
QE notes: Look for reflow issues in the native text control on first edit and after subsequent edits that change the textHeight.
Transferred from the Adobe Open Source Subversion Repository
Updated fix for SDK-29959. Hard-coded rightMargin value for TextAreaSkin and updated paddingRight values to compensate for scroll bar thumb position.
QE notes: TextArea leading (space between lines) should now be consistent between TextField and native control. paddingRight should be proportional to DPI.
